channel.title: Adding Commands?
channel.description:
This is nooby, but im just starting making servers...
How do you add a command like ::command and then you recive items?
so for example you typed ::zammy you got zammy stuff??
- Thanks, toonshorty

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:11, topic:127631”]Doggie, if you want to change a command to admins only, just add playerRights >= 2, the code would look like

if(command.startsWith("whip") && playerRights >= 2) {

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ricky, Chemical, what the hell are you thinking? You totally screwed up the first line of the command. It’d be

if(command.startsWith("whip")) {

NOT

if(command.startsWith (("whip")) {

Doggie, if you want to change a command to admins only, just add playerRights >= 2, the code would look like

if(command.startsWith("whip") && playerRights >= 2) {

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

If you wanted it to say You got your Whip or something like that, it would look like…

if(command.startsWith (("whip")) { addItem(4151, 1); sendMessage("Oh Noob! Nice Whip"); }

OR if you wanted it to send a message to EVERYONE on line it would be…

if(command.startsWith (("whip")) { addItem(4151, 1); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" got his whip"; }
If you done that, if someone called…err bum…
it would be like bum got his whip

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

Here’s an example

if(command.startsWith ((“whip”)) {
addItem(4151, 1);
// add more if you want
}

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

No, because moparscape recognises it as a command you just type the command name… “:: is the command thing to show it is a command” e.g. you do not put ("::barrows") you just put (“barrows”)

NOTE: You must type :: in the textbox ingame

When you type “::” moparscape recognises the following word as a command

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @poleke-pk poleke-pk
item.description:
@poleke-pk wrote:

must i put command or ::command

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Search for: public void customCommand(String command) {

Then under it do this:
Add:

if(command.startsWith("commandhere")) {
addItem(item id, amount);
// add more if you want
}

Tell me if that worked ok for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Savagedemon Savagedemon
item.description:
@Savagedemon wrote:

There is but its dodgy… You could always look for a command in the game thats already there (In client.java) copy and paste that after the } then change the name and were it says add item change the number of the item that you will recieve when typing that code it works great =D

Read full topic
